specialTipSize.specialTip: When an employee with Fortitude or Temperance Level 1 finished their work, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When the Work was performed with $0, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a low probability.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter lowered with a low probability.
When employee #0 panicked during work, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
$0 voluntarily returned to its containment after a period of time had passed.
#0 was ordered to suppress $0. When they tried to attack it, the Abnormaliry emitted ominous mechanical sound. Afterward, anomalies detected in the facility.
This Abnormality is not affected by Qliphoth Meltdowns.
